search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for TicketSpice (ticketspice.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official TicketSpice pricing page can be found at this URL: [https://www.ticketspice.com/pricing](https://www.ticketspice.com/pricing)【3:1†source】.

citations.title: TicketSpice Pricing | Low Cost Event Ticketing System

extracted_content.content:
TicketSpice Pricing | Low Cost Event Ticketing System
===============
           

[Attend a Demo](https://www.ticketspice.com/demo)

Contact Sales

Connect with Our Sales Team

[![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628ca9bb3aa82873aa29c4b8/629e129029146e6c4f0fae01_calendly.svg) Schedule a call](https://www.ticketspice.com/get-help)

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628ca9bb3aa82873aa29c4b8/629e1291d7121b60e0d02c14_phone.svg)Call:

[Features](https://www.ticketspice.com/features)

[**Event Page Builder** Drag & drop builder creates powerful ticketing pages](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/features-event-ticketing-page-builder)[**Branding Control** Customize stunning pages to match your brand](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/custom-branded-event-ticketing-pages)[**Conditional Logic Actions** Create workflows and set dynamic pricing](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/conditional-logic-event-ticketing-software)[Ticket Scanning Ticket scanning by QR code to handle any event](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/ticket-scanning-app)[Sell Add-ons and Upgrades Sell event merchandise and experiences](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/sell-upgrades-add-ons-and-merch-on-event-ticketing-pages)[**Text Message Delivery** Send text tickets to scan upon entry](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/electronic-and-sms-text-message-ticket-delivery)[Reserved Seating Create seating charts, layouts, and pods](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/reserved-seating-event-ticketing-system)[Fast Event Payouts Get fast and direct event funding every week](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/fast-event-payouts-ticketing-software)[Timed Entry Ticketing Sell tickets for recurring, daily, or timed-entry events](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/timed-entry-event-ticketing-software)[Box Office App Sell tickets via credit card or cash on site with ease](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/box-office-app-software-to-sell-tickets)[Real Time Analytics See your event's performance & conversions](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/event-ticketing-analytics)[Fraud Prevention Sophisticated monitoring to stop fraud](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/fraud-prevention)[Exports and Reports Easy reporting and exporting of all sales and data](https://www.ticketspice.com/features/exports-and-reports-for-event-ticketing-data)

Event Pros Save Thousands With TicketSpice
==========================================

Don't get gouged by Eventbrite, Ticketleap, and eTix. The best events & attractions use TicketSpice.  
  
TicketSpice is a flat 99¢ fee per ticket plus basic credit card processing rates of 2.9% + 30¢.

[Sign up](https://signup.ticketspice.com/?utm_cta=hero)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What is TicketSpice pricing?

TicketSpice pricing is simple. Just 99¢ per ticket plus standard credit card processing rates of 2.9% + 30¢ (that you can pass on to your attendees). Fees are deducted from your event payouts before they are direct deposited in your bank account.

Can I pass along fees or mark them up?

You can choose to absorb the fees or pass on the fees to your ticket buyers. You also can add any additional ticketing fees or convenience fees and keep 100% of any fees you choose to add.

What do you charge for free events?

Event organizers who run paid events can run free events for free. If you are not organizing paid events, the pricing is 99¢ a ticket.

What is your on-site pricing?

TicketSpice provides you a great on-site box office app to sell tickets on-site. When using the box office app, your ticket pricing drops down to 49¢ per paid ticket.

How fast can I get my event payouts?

Get paid weekly! Unlike many other event ticketing companies that make you wait until after your event to get paid, we offer weekly payouts directly to your bank account. Most choose weekly payouts for simpler bookeeping.

What payment processors can I use?

Most customers use our in-house processor, Webconnex Payments. But you’re also welcome to use Stripe, Authorize.net, NMI, Paya, Cybersource, Payflow Pro, and SecureNet. A 1% fee is applied and charged in USD. [Learn more about all the processors and fees here](https://help.ticketspice.com/en/articles/2471678-compatible-gateways).

Do you have platform, setup, or support fees?

Nope, nada, zilch. Just the flat 99¢ per ticket plus standard credit card processing rates of 2.9% + 30¢.

What if my tickets are less than $5?

When selling tickets that are $5 or less, the TicketSpice pricing drops to 49¢ a ticket.

Understood

TicketSpice's simple pricing saves event organizers thousands compared to Eventbrite, TicketLeap and Showclix. Sell tickets online for less.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: TicketSpice charges a flat fee per ticket along with standard credit card processing fees. Additional optional services are available for monthly fees.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Flat fee per ticket plus credit card processing rates.
